mapper.select: SELECT schedule_no, schedule_title, schedule_image, schedule_view_count, schedule_count, schedule_at FROM schedules WHERE club_no = #{clubNo} ORDER BY schedule_created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedules (schedule_title, schedule_content, schedule_image, account, club_no, schedule_at) VALUES (#{scheduleTitle}, #{scheduleContent}, #{scheduleImage}, #{account}, #{clubNo}, #{scheduleAt})
